name: Pork Chops in a Mushroom Wine Sauce
author: T-fal
summary: Easy to prepare, these pork chops are braised in a mushroom wine sauce until they are tender and flavorful. Serve with risotto and steamed vegetables.
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  cream of mushroom soup
directions: Heat a fry pan to medium-high
Season the pork chops on both sides with salt and pepper
Quickly brown the pork chops in the pan, 3 to 4 minutes per side
No need to cook them all the way, as they'll finish cooking in the oven
Remove them from the pan and set aside
Leave the juices from the browned pork chops in the pan
Add the diced onion and saute until tender, about 5 minutes
Add the soup, white wine, and mushrooms
Add the browned pork chops, and any juices that may have accumulated, back into the pan with the sauce
Spoon some sauce on top of the pork chops
Cover and place in the oven; bake for about 45 minutes
Take the lid off and bake an additional 15 minutes
